name: Determine an odd-even number
instruction:
Write a function `oddEven` that takes 1 parameter `num` .

It returns 1 if the number is odd and 0 if it is even.

Use the `%` operator to determine whether a number is even.

Examples:
```javascript
oddEven(1) // 1
oddEven(2) // 0
oddEven(3) // 1
oddEven(4) // 0
oddEven(5) // 1
oddEven(6) // 0
oddEven(7) // 1
```
